short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skips every video ad on YouTube automatically

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy YouTube videos with no ads!

Say goodbye to ads before videos, in the middle of the videos and after videos!

The extension simply works quietly with no configuration needed.

Works on YouTube website and on any embedded YouTube video on foreign websites.

Watch whatever you want with no interruptions!
